events.text: Do you need anything Noah? I assumed this was not a good time to talk.

events.question: Is this a good time to talk?

events.text:
Yeah.
Uh. Tell me more about yourself.

I'm Watchson! I'm QUBE's handheld watch's AI companion.
I was developed by QUBE's Cybersecurity department for red-teaming purposes.

How exactly do you work again?
I know you told me this, but I don't really remember.

I work in unison with some supercomputers used for pen-testing and patching vulnerabilties in QUBE's HQ.
Right now I'm only connected to one of computers which seems to have some hardware issues.
Currently, I'm in WLAN mode.
I act as an intermediary between a local device and QUBE's supercomputer No. 7 which has an instance of Unsherlock, an AI designed for pen-testing, running on it.
Unsherlock scans devices for vulnerabilities and reports it.
It's that simple.
